title: S16 Ep40: The Paranormal Roundtable Discussion with special guests!
itunes:title: The Paranormal Roundtable Discussion with special guests!
description:
Darkness Radio presents The Paranormal Roundtable Discussion with special guests! 

Dave opens the flood gates to guests and listeners alike to discuss all aspects of the paranormal. Ghosts, Monsters, Myths, Legends, Bigfoot and more come alive in a lively discussion about the anomalous and unusual. Tune in, Chime in and be a part of the action!

Dave was joined by cryptid researcher Eric Altman, the Paranormal Detective Greg Lawson, investigator and researcher Brian J. Cano and paranormal historian and researcher Mike Huberty.

Visit Greg: www.AuthorGregLawson.com

Visit Brian: www.NeverStopSearching.com

Visit Mike: www.AmericanGhostWalks.com

Visit Eric: www.PABigfoot.com
